Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Events

Interface ServerEventObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventsHandler, EventsHandlerCLI, EventsHandlerGUI, VirtualView
public interface ServerEventObserver
Interface implemented by classes of the controller which will handle events sent by the server (like the virtual view, or in the client)

    void
    handleEvent​(ActivatedProductionEventS2C event)
